Your faith enhances your ability to remove conditions. Add the following options to the list of conditions you can counteract for any type of mercy you can grant.

  • Mercy of the Body @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]; if you're 16th level, add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]

  • Mercy of Grace @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]; if you're 12th level, add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Petrified]; if you're 16th level, add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]

  • Mercy of the Mind @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Controlled], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]; if you're 16th level, add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned].
